main event: An investigation into the sighting of alleged flying saucers near Gilchrist Beach, Galveston, Texas, on June 1949, following a report received in March 1949.
interesting points: The observer reported hearing a roaring noise and seeing sailing objects over telephone poles,The observed sailing object descended toward the water at approximately forty miles per hour,The investigation stemmed from communication made by Colonel W. R. Clingensmith,Technical Intelligence Division, to Wright-Patterson Air Force Base,The document indicates various procedural steps for investigation and interviews with witnesses in Beaumont, Texas,This report is part of Project 'Grudge' under the jurisdiction of the Air Force Inspector General's Office.
witness description: An observer swimming at Gilchrist Beach
